short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple mini driving game built up by text! Made by CCIB

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a driving game.
You needs to avoid obstacles "# (red)"
You are controling "^ (yellow)"
There are 3 paths 
You have to go farther and farther as you can!
hint:
- You can try the control at "stop" speed
- By moving left and right, you also can pass the edge
- Read the cover page before your first try
